name: Falling (Edgar Quex)
description:
Here is   my entry for the Ludum Dare Jam #50  with the theme "Delayed the inevitable"

This time i wanted to make a simple physics game with an Paper Airplane  where you must to prevent to fall to fast, keeping on air the most time you can.

I'm using Phaser 3 for developing.

This is a beta prototype of the game, i miss some things but i will keep working these days to finish it and fix bugs.

Roadmap

  1. [BUG] Game scene not restart correctly
  2. [Feature] Boost items on air to boost fly and keep on air more time
  3. [Feature] Clouds
  4. [Feature] Flags to mark distance points.
  5. [Feature] Put music and sounds.

I hope your enjoy this prototype.
